name: Training DAY (Michael Jaramillo)
description:
If you have no bullets when you first start game ... Go to leaderboards and upgrades -----> then to upgrades ------> delete everything  (player will then start with 25 bullets )

Key :   'A' = MOVE LEFT   

             'W' = JUMP

             'S' = SLIDE 

            'D' = MOVE RIGHT

            'SPACE BAR'=  SHOOT

PLEASE UNZIP FILES TO PLAY GAME  (You may need to manually make your  computer trust app in settings ).
